name: qiita-notifications
description: Displays unread Qiita notifications count and list recent notifications.

scripts.build: npm run build:rm && npm run build:mkdir && npm run build:cp && npm run build:scss && npm run build:browserify
scripts.build:browserify: browserify src/chrome/js/background.js -t babelify -o dist/chrome/js/background.js && browserify src/chrome/js/popup.jsx -t babelify -o dist/chrome/js/popup.js
scripts.build:cp: cp src/chrome/manifest.json dist/chrome/manifest.json && cp src/chrome/html/* dist/chrome/html && cp src/chrome/images/* dist/chrome/images
scripts.build:mkdir: mkdir -p dist/chrome/html && mkdir -p dist/chrome/js && mkdir -p dist/chrome/css && mkdir -p dist/chrome/images
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run pack:crx
scripts.pack:crx: crx pack dist/chrome -o dist/chrome/qiita-notifications.crx && rm dist/chrome/key.pem
scripts.watch: npm run watch:cp & npm run watch:background & npm run watch:popup & npm run watch:scss
